description:
RealSimpleEDU.com brings you on-the-go learning and reference for Trigonometry.

App offers quizzes and tutorials  to help you learn Trigonometry.

App is continuously updated based on your feedback.Your 100% satisfaction is guaranteed.

App Tools include search .

Includes following tutorials:

Introduction,
Domain and Range,
Angles,
Trigonometric Functions,
Graphing Trigonometric Functions,
Inverse Trigonometric Functions,
Trigonometric Identity,
Trigonometry Formulae,
Graphing Sinusoidal Functions,
Triangle Formulae,
Solving Right Triangles,
Solving Oblique Triangles,
Polar Coordinates,
Complex Numbers,
Trigonometric Equations,
Hyperbolic Functions,
Hyperbolic Functions Formulae.


Includes following quizzes:

Quiz on Trigonometry Basics,
Quiz on Trigonometric Functions and Their Graphs,
Quiz onTrigonometric Identities,
Quiz on Trigonometric Equations and Polar Coordinates,
Quiz on Miscellaneous Topics.

What is unique about RealSimpleEdu apps? 

1) A touch friendly, quick reference app, which is always in your pocket and always works (no data connection required)

2) A companion app for on-the-go, bite-sized learning 

3) Offers value for money (A lifetime of free updates) 

4) 200,000 paying customers from 153 Countries
Our Vision: Provide on-the-go references that enable our customers to refer, learn and remember; easy to learn, more engaging and most complete.

Our Mission: A RealSimpleEDU app in every pocket.

Please write to us. We would love to improve this app.
versionNote:
